summary: This document is an invoice summary from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing various FedEx transportation charges incurred on multiple shipments. The invoice includes specific details about the sender, recipient, and charges for each shipment, highlighting the frequency and nature of the shipping activities associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
